main-about_site_text: This website is an information source for the ZCity server. Here you can find information on mechanics, modes, binds, and useful tips that will help you in the game.
main-info-text1: Z-City is a server in the game Garry's mod, with such modes as: Homicide; TDM and etc.
main-info-text2: The server features realistic body behavior, bleeding, ragdoll control, and a well-thought-out weapon system.
main-info-text3: Compared to its previous project, Homigrad, ZCity differs both visually and mechanically. Gameplay on the server is also significantly slower than in Homigrad.
servers-desc: This page presents the official servers of the project.
donate-link-desc: Please note that this is nothing more than support for server development; you will not receive any benefits.
discord-link-desc: Community Discord servers where development posts, announcements, and events are frequently posted.
